name: Formorph
description:
Formorph is a 2D Jump and Run in which you have the ability to change your size. With this power you can navigate through the 11 Levels with increasing complexity.

When you are big you can float on water and are more vulnerable to wind.

When you are small you fall in water like a rock and can navigate in wind much better.

You can also use your dead bodies as platforms.

This is my first Unity project and I am happy to share the source (*Projectfile*), so just ask and I will upload it. You can also critique the game, so I can improve on it and make better games in the future.

Controls
Movement: A, D
Jump: W
Morph: S
Pause: ESC

Made by Solocov

Twitter & Youtube
